title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: warp-faced plain weave patterned by warp dyed (possibly printed) stripes
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 45 x 12 cm (17 11/16 x 4 3/4 in.)
description: Ikat-like warp stripes in two shades of pink, magenta, yellow and green. Component "e" has applied yellow silk fringe. Components "d,g" have ikat-like warp stripes in green and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: warp-faced plain weave patterned by warp dyed (possibly printed) stripes. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-115-a.
